snippet: We have been shown, says The Sacramento Union, some exceedingly rich specimens of auriferous quartz, which were taken from a ledge located two miles above the Forks of the Consumnes river. Dr. Thomas, who brought this specimen down on, Saturday, S...
lead_paragraph: We have been shown, says The Sacramento Union, some exceedingly rich specimens of auriferous quartz, which were taken from a ledge located two miles above the Forks of the Consumnes river. Dr. Thomas, who brought this specimen down on, Saturday, Says that he thinks there are no veins in the country more promising.
